metadata.title: CVE-2021-47308 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: scsi:libfc: Fix array index out of bound exception Fix array index out of boundexception in fc_rport_prli_resp().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
